mapper.select: SELECT blmt.LINK_ID AS linkId,blmt.LINK_NAME AS linkName, blmt.persistence AS persistence FROM t_business_link_manage_table blmt INNER JOIN t_link_manage_table lmt ON blmt.RELATED_TECH_LINK = lmt.LINK_ID WHERE blmt.ENTRACE LIKE #{entrance} AND lmt.APPLICATION_NAME = #{appName} AND blmt.IS_DELETED = 0
